docs.snippet: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, Jan. 28--The United States appeared assured today of the support of a wide majority of the hemisphere's foreign ministers for a plan to exclude Cuba from participation in the inter-American system.

docs.snippet: Madison Avenue's biggest advertising agencies in recent months have been locked in a bitter competitive struggle to expand their operations overseas. Some agencies have established new offices abroad; some have acquired a financial interest in...
docs.lead_paragraph: Madison Avenue's biggest advertising agencies in recent months have been locked in a bitter competitive struggle to expand their operations overseas. Some agencies have established new offices abroad; some have acquired a financial interest in foreign agencies. But hardly a week goes by without word of some new invasion by an American agency.
docs.abstract: T Aitken Jr warns US agencies of problems in expanding operations abroad

headline.main: Advertising: Peril Found in Overseas Steps
